title: Bloomberg Markets: Zlomek on VC Deals, Wang on Amazon News
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Zlomek on VC Deals, Wang on Amazon News
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUESTS: Erin Zlomek Editor Bloomberg Wrap Discussing this week's venture capital deals news, including Clutter raising $64 million in a round led by Atomico; GV (formerly Google Ventures) and Sequoia Capital. Selina Wang Global Technology Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing Amazon.com buying Whole Foods Market and the comparison to what Alibaba does in Asia.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
